basic.description:
Textual analysis of narrative and other films, including examination of formal, aesthetic, and narrative techniques and conventions, and their production of meaning in social and political contexts.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Critical Inquiry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (A grade of B- in FILM 110) or (a GPA of 2.60 in FILM 104 and FILM 106) or (a GPA of 2.60 in BISC100 and FILM104) and (reg. in a FILM Plan, STSC or the Computer-Film (COFI) Specialization Plan).
